metadata.titleEn: High resolution atmosphere-hydrologic simulation dataset over the Tibetan Plateau (2000-2010)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原逐3小时高分辨率大气-水文模拟数据集（2000-2010）
metadata.description: The high-resolution atmosphere-hydrologic simulation dataset over Tibetan Plateau is prepared by WRFv4.1.1 model with grids of 191 * 355 and spatial resolution of 9 km, and a spatial range covering the entire plateau. The main physics schemes are configured with Thompson microphysics scheme, the rapid radiative transfer model (RRTM), and the Dudhia scheme for longwave and shortwave radiative flux calculations, respectively, the Mellor-Yamada-Janjic (MYJ) TKE scheme for the planetary boundary layer and the Unified Noah Land Surface Model. The time resolution is 3h and the time span is 2000-2010. Variables include: precipitation (Rain), temperature (T2) and water vapor (Q2) at 2m height on the ground, surface skin temperature (TSK), ground pressure (PSFC), zonal component (U10) and meridional component (V10) at 10m heigh on the ground, downward long-wave flux (GLW) and downward short-wave flux (SWDOWN) at surface, ground heat flux (GRDFLX), sensible heat flux (HFX), latent heat flux (LH), surface runoff (SFROFF) and underground runoff (UDROFF). The data can effectively support the study of regional climate characteristics, climate change and its impact over the Tibet Plateau, which will provide scientific basis for the sustainable development of the TP under the background of climate change.
metadata.descriptionCn: 采用WRF4.1.1模式制备的青藏高原高分辨率大气-水文模拟数据集，格点数为191*355，空间分辨率9km，覆盖范围如图1所示，时间分辨率为3h，模拟时采用的主要参数化方案包括：Thompson微物理方案、RRTM长波辐射方案、Dudhia短波辐射方案、MYJ边界层方案、Noah陆面过程方案。数据的时间跨度为2000-2010年，变量包括：降水（Rain），地面2m高度的温度（T2）和湿度（Q2），地表温度（TSK）、地面气压（PSFC）、地面上10m风场的纬向分量（U10）、地面上10m风场的经向分量（V10）。地表向下的长波通量（GLW）、地表向下短波通量（SWDOWN）、地表热通量（GRDFLX）、感热通量（HFX）、潜热通量（LH）、地表径流（SFROFF）、地下径流（UDROFF）等。该数据可有效支撑青藏高原地区区域气候特征及气候变化研究。
metadata.instructions: Data storage and naming method: the data is in NetCDF format and is stored year by year according to variables, such as T2_ wrfout_ d01_ 2000.nc is the T2 data of 2000. The storage method is [month | 12] x [day | 31] x [hour | 8] x [south| North | 191] x [west| 355], where month is the 12 months of the year, day is the number of days of each month (less than 31 days set as the default), and hour corresponds to 00/03/06/09/12/15/18/21 of each day, South_ North and West_ East gives longitude and latitude. The related longitude and latitude information, terrain and land use data are stored in file of Static_lat_lon_wrfout_d01.nc.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据为netcdf格式，按变量逐年存储，如T2_wrfout_d01_2000.nc为2000年T2数据，存储方式为[month | 12] x [day | 31] x [hour | 8] x [south_north | 191] x [west_east | 355]，其中month为一年的12个月，day为每个月的天数（不足31天的设为缺省），hour对应每天的00/03/06/09/12/15/18/21时，south_north和west_east是对应的经纬度。数据对应的经纬度信息、地形和土地利用数据存储于Static_lat_lon_wrfout_d01.nc文件。

background: The Tibetan Plateau (TP) plays a complicated impact on summer extreme precipitation in downstream areas like Yangtze Plain, and the convection-permitting modeling (CPM) over the TP has obvious added value for regional climate simulation.
research objective: This study investigates whether the CPM over the TP can improve the simulation of a typical extreme Meiyu rainfall in Yangtze Plain and the possible mechanism.
challenges: The complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain over the largest and highest plateau in the world limit the availability of observational data and development numerical model, which leads to considerable uncertainties in simulations of weather and climate over the TP.
methods: The Advanced Research Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) used in this study is version 4.1. The initial and boundary conditions for the large-scale atmospheric fields, as well as the initial soil parameters (soil water, moisture, and temperature), are obtained from the global atmospheric reanalysis data, ECMWF interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim). The sea surface temperature is updated during the simulation period by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature Analysis. Three experiments are conducted to investigate the influence of the CPM over the TP on the simulation of Meiyu rainfall and its possible mechanism. All experiments keep the same physical configurations in the WRF model and are started at 0000 UTC on May 15, 2011 and continue until 0000 UTC on July 1, 2011. Only the results from June 1 to June 30 are analyzed.
dataset: We apply the CN05.1 gridded daily precipitation dataset covered the period of 1961 – 2015 to investigate the precipitation anomaly in June 2011. The first two rainfall observation is from the real-time analysis system with 0.25° grids (OBS_0.25) and 0.1° grids (OBS_0.1) in China from the National Meteorological Information Center. The third data is the forcing dataset with 0.1° grids developed by the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau Research Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (ITPCAS).
findings: Results reveal that the CPM over the TP better reproduces the regional climate over the TP in terms of the precipitation and temperature. The more realistic representation of the regional climate over the TP can further improve the simulation of the spatial distribution of rainfall, the maximum center of rainfall and heavy rainfall processes of Meiyu rainfall in June 2011 but with a wet bias, which could be attributed to too much convective precipitation caused by the cumulus parameterizations. This work demonstrates the potential for the more realistic representation of atmosphere and land surface information over TP to improve the simulations and prediction of extreme Meiyu rainfall.
backgroundCn: 青藏高原（TP）对下游地区如长江平原的夏季极端降水产生复杂影响，而在青藏高原进行的高分辨率对流允许模型（CPM）在区域气候模拟中具有明显的附加价值。
research objectiveCn: 本研究探讨了CPM相对于TP是否能够改善对长江平原典型极端梅雨降雨的模拟及其可能机制。
challengesCn: 世界上最大和最高的高原的基础表面和地形的复杂性和异质性限制了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展，这导致对青藏 Plateau（TP）天气和气候模拟的相当不确定性。
methodsCn: 本研究中使用的高级研究天气预报与预报（WRF）版本为4.1。大规模大气场的初始和边界条件，以及初始土壤参数（土壤水分、湿度和温度）均来自全球大气再分析数据，即欧洲中期天气预报中心的临时再分析（ERA-Interim）。海表温度在模拟期间由美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）最优插值海表温度分析进行更新。为研究气候模式（CPM）对青藏高原（TP）上梅雨降水的影响及其可能机制，进行了三项实验。所有实验在WRF模型中保持相同的物理配置，并于2011年5月15日0000 UTC开始，持续至2011年7月1日0000 UTC。仅分析2011年6月1日至6月30日的结果。
datasetCn: 我们应用CN05.1网格化日降水数据集，覆盖1961年至2015年期间，以研究2011年6月的降水异常。前两个降水观测数据来自中国国家气象信息中心的实时分析系统，分别为0.25°网格（OBS_0.25）和0.1°网格（OBS_0.1）。第三个数据是由中国科学院青藏高原研究所开发的0.1°网格强迫数据集（ITPCAS）。
findingsCn: 结果显示，CPM在青藏 Plateau（TP）上的表现优于其他模型，更好地再现了该地区的气候特征，包括降水和温度。对TP地区气候的更真实表现进一步改善了对2011年6月梅雨降水的空间分布、降水最大中心和强降水过程的模拟，但存在湿偏差，这可能归因于由于积云参数化导致的过多对流降水。这项工作展示了在TP地区更真实地表现大气和陆地表面信息的潜力，从而改善极端梅雨降水的模拟和预测。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the use of the WRF 4.1.1 model include specific parameterization schemes for accurate simulation over the Tibetan Plateau?
Verification.QuestionCn: WRF 4.1.1模型的使用是否包括针对青藏高原的准确模拟的特定参数化方案？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the CN05.1 gridded daily precipitation dataset utilized for investigating precipitation anomalies over the Tibetan Plateau?
Verification.QuestionCn: CN05.1网格化日降水数据集是否用于研究青藏高原的降水异常？

Verification.QuestionEn: Do the challenges in simulating weather and climate over the Tibetan Plateau arise from the complexity and heterogeneity of its underlying surface and terrain?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原进行天气和气候模拟的挑战是否源于其下垫面和地形的复杂性和异质性？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which data collection method is more suitable for simulating regional climate over the Tibetan Plateau: using ECMWF interim reanalysis data for large-scale atmospheric fields or using NOAA Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature Analysis?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种数据收集方法更适合模拟青藏高原的区域气候：使用ECMWF临时再分析数据进行大规模大气场的模拟，还是使用NOAA最佳插值海表温度分析？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: ECMWF interim reanalysis data for large-scale atmospheric fields
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: ECMWF临时再分析数据用于大尺度大气场

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: What is a more significant challenge in collecting observational data over the Tibetan Plateau: the complexity of the underlying surface and terrain or the development of numerical models?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏高原的观测数据时，底层表面和地形的复杂性与数值模型的发展，哪个是更显著的挑战？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: the complexity of the underlying surface and terrain
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 底层表面和地形的复杂性

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges faced in collecting observational data over the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏高原的观察数据时面临的主要挑战有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 底层表面和地形的复杂性和异质性。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can one obtain the initial and boundary conditions for large-scale atmospheric fields used in simulation over the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在哪里可以获得用于在青藏高原上进行模拟的大规模大气场的初始和边界条件？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: ECMWF 过渡期再分析 ERA-Interim

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What dataset is used to investigate precipitation anomalies in June 2011 over the Tibetan Plateau, and where is it applied?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于研究2011年6月青藏高原降水异常的数据集是什么，以及它应用于哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: CN05.1 网格化逐日降水数据集

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to obtain high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological simulation data in the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于获取高分辨率大气和水文模拟数据的资料收集方法的例子，特别是在青藏高原地区？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method for high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological simulation data in the Tibetan Plateau involves using the WRF4.1.1 model with key parameterization schemes such as the Thompson microphysics scheme, RRTM longwave radiation scheme, Dudhia shortwave radiation scheme, MYJ boundary layer scheme, and Noah land surface process scheme, collecting data over a grid of 191x355 with a spatial resolution of 9km and temporal resolution of 3 hours, spanning from 2000 to 2010.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种用于收集高分辨率大气和水文模拟数据的方法是在青藏高原使用WRF4.1.1模型，采用关键的参数化方案，如汤普森微物理方案、RRTM长波辐射方案、杜迪亚短波辐射方案、MYJ边界层方案和诺亚陆面过程方案，数据收集覆盖一个191x355的网格，空间分辨率为9公里，时间分辨率为3小时，时间跨度为2000年至2010年。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of challenges faced in simulating weather and climate over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 你能举例说明在模拟青藏高原的天气和气候时面临的挑战吗？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of challenges in simulating weather and climate over the Tibetan Plateau includes the complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain, which limit the availability of observational data and the development of numerical models, leading to considerable uncertainties in the simulations.
Example.AnswerCn: 在模拟青藏 Plateau 的天气和气候时面临的挑战之一是底层表面和地形的复杂性和异质性，这限制了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展，从而导致模拟中的相当大的不确定性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a dataset used to investigate precipitation anomalies in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究青藏高原地区降水异常的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used to investigate precipitation anomalies in the Tibetan Plateau region is the CN05.1 gridded daily precipitation dataset covering the period of 1961 – 2015, which is used alongside real-time analysis systems with 0.25° and 0.1° grids in China from the National Meteorological Information Center, and a forcing dataset with 0.1° grids developed by the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau Research Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个用于研究青藏高原地区降水异常的数据集是CN05.1网格化日降水数据集，覆盖1961年至2015年期间，该数据集与中国国家气象信息中心提供的0.25°和0.1°网格的实时分析系统一起使用，以及由中国科学院青藏高原研究所开发的0.1°网格强迫数据集。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main characteristics of the atmospheric and hydrological simulation data used for studying regional climate features over the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于研究青藏 Plateau 区域气候特征的大气和水文模拟数据的主要特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high-resolution, spatial resolution of 9 km, temporal resolution of 3 hours, period from 2000 to 2010, precipitation, temperature at 2m height, humidity at 2m height, surface temperature, surface pressure, wind components at 10m height, longwave and shortwave fluxes, ground heat flux, sensible heat flux, latent heat flux, surface runoff, underground runoff
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高分辨率，空间分辨率为9公里，时间分辨率为3小时，时间段为2000年至2010年，降水，2米高度的温度，2米高度的湿度，地表温度，地表气压，10米高度的风分量，长波和短波辐射，地面热通量，感热通量，潜热通量，地表径流，地下径流。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with numerical modeling and data collection in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与青藏 Plateau地区的数值建模和数据收集相关的挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: complexity, heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain, limited availability of observational data, considerable uncertainties in simulations
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 复杂性、下垫面和地形的异质性、观测数据的有限性、模拟中的相当不确定性。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of a high-resolution atmospheric-hydrological simulation dataset over the Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 高分辨率大气-水文模拟数据集在青藏高原上的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many grid points are used in the atmospheric-hydrological simulation dataset for the Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 青藏 Plateau 的大气-水文模拟数据集使用了多少个网格点？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over what time span is the high-resolution atmospheric-hydrological simulation dataset for the Tibetan Plateau available?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 高分辨率大气-水文模拟数据集针对青藏高原的可用时间跨度是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'WRF4.1.1 model' used for in atmospheric-hydrological simulations?
Definition.QuestionCn: 'WRF4.1.1模型'在大气-水文模拟中用于什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The WRF4.1.1 model is used for conducting high-resolution atmospheric-hydrological simulations over regions like the Tibetan Plateau, applying specific parameterization schemes for microphysics, radiation, boundary layer processes, and land surface processes to produce a detailed dataset.
Definition.AnswerCn: WRF4.1.1模型用于在像青藏高原这样的地区进行高分辨率的气象-水文模拟，应用特定的参数化方案用于微物理、辐射、边界层过程和陆面过程，以生成详细的数据集。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods used in atmospheric-hydrological models on the Tibetan Plateau compare to those used for precipitation anomaly studies in China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的气候水文模型中使用的数据收集方法与中国降水异常研究中使用的方法相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The atmospheric-hydrological models on the Tibetan Plateau use high-resolution simulations with WRF 4.1.1, incorporating reanalysis data for atmospheric fields and NOAA sea surface temperatures, while precipitation anomaly studies in China utilize CN05.1 gridded datasets and real-time analysis systems with different grid resolutions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau 的大气-水文模型使用高分辨率模拟，采用 WRF 4.1.1，结合再分析数据用于大气场和 NOAA 海表温度，而中国的降水异常研究则利用 CN05.1 网格数据集和不同网格分辨率的实时分析系统。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when collecting observational data over the Tibetan Plateau compared to other regions like the Yangtze Plain?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏高原的观察数据时，与长江平原等其他地区相比，面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau presents challenges due to its complex terrain and limited observational data, leading to uncertainties in climate simulations, whereas regions like the Yangtze Plain may benefit from more uniform topography and potentially greater availability of observational data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 青藏高原由于其复杂的地形和有限的观测数据，给气候模拟带来了挑战，而像长江平原这样的地区可能受益于更为均匀的地形和潜在的更多观测数据。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the spatial resolution of a dataset collected using numerical models like WRF influence the accuracy and reliability of climate simulations over complex terrains such as the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用像WRF这样的数值模型收集的数据集的空间分辨率如何影响在复杂地形（如青藏高原）上的气候模拟的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The spatial resolution of a dataset, like the 9km resolution used in the WRF model, can significantly affect the accuracy of climate simulations over the Tibetan Plateau due to its complex and heterogeneous terrain. Higher resolution can capture more detailed variations in topography and land surface processes, leading to better representation of regional climate patterns and extreme weather events.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据集的空间分辨率，如WRF模型中使用的9公里分辨率，可能会显著影响对青藏高原气候模拟的准确性，因为该地区地形复杂且异质性强。更高的分辨率可以捕捉到地形和地表过程的更详细变化，从而更好地表征区域气候模式和极端天气事件。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the integration of additional observational data sources enhance the reliability of datasets used for modeling climate phenomena on the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 整合额外的观测数据源可以通过哪些方式增强用于模拟青藏高原气候现象的数据集的可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of additional observational data sources, such as more comprehensive rainfall observations and soil moisture data, could enhance the reliability of datasets by providing more accurate initial and boundary conditions for models. This could reduce uncertainties in simulations, improving the representation of climate phenomena like precipitation and temperature over the Tibetan Plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 整合更多的观测数据源，例如更全面的降雨观测和土壤湿度数据，可以通过为模型提供更准确的初始和边界条件来增强数据集的可靠性。这可以减少模拟中的不确定性，提高对青藏高原上气候现象（如降水和温度）的表征。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain to limit the availability of observational data and development of numerical models over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致青藏 Plateau 的基础表面和地形复杂性和异质性限制观测数据的可用性和数值模型发展的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau, being the largest and highest plateau in the world, presents a highly complex and heterogeneous surface and terrain. This complexity affects the availability of observational data and the development of numerical models, leading to considerable uncertainties in simulations of weather and climate over the region due to challenges in accurately representing the diverse conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 青藏高原是世界上最大和最高的高原，呈现出高度复杂和异质的表面和地形。这种复杂性影响了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展，导致在该地区天气和气候模拟中存在相当大的不确定性，因为在准确表示多样化条件方面面临挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to update the sea surface temperature during the simulation period when using the Advanced Research Weather Research and Forecasting model?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用高级研究天气预报模型（Advanced Research Weather Research and Forecasting model）进行模拟时，更新海表温度是必要的，原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Updating the sea surface temperature during the simulation period is crucial because it ensures the model accurately reflects the evolving oceanic conditions, which can significantly influence atmospheric processes. In the context of the Tibetan Plateau, accurate sea surface temperature data is necessary to improve the representation of atmospheric and land surface interactions, thereby enhancing the simulation of regional climate and extreme weather events.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在模拟期间更新海表温度至关重要，因为这确保模型准确反映不断变化的海洋条件，而这些条件可能显著影响大气过程。在青藏高原的背景下，准确的海表温度数据对于改善大气和陆面相互作用的表现至关重要，从而增强区域气候和极端天气事件的模拟。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the wet bias observed in the simulation of Meiyu rainfall over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致在模拟青藏 Plateau 梅雨降水时观察到湿偏差的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The wet bias in the simulation of Meiyu rainfall over the Tibetan Plateau is attributed to excessive convective precipitation caused by the cumulus parameterizations used in the model. This suggests that while the model may improve the spatial distribution and intensity of rainfall, adjustments in the parameterizations are needed to reduce the wet bias and improve simulation accuracy.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 对青藏高原梅雨降水模拟中的湿偏差的归因于模型中使用的积云参数化导致的过量对流降水。这表明，尽管模型可能改善了降水的空间分布和强度，但需要对参数化进行调整，以减少湿偏差并提高模拟精度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using the Thompson microphysics scheme in atmospheric-hydrological simulations over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在青藏 Plateau 上使用汤普森微物理方案进行大气-水文模拟的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing the Thompson microphysics scheme can result in a more accurate representation of precipitation processes, which is crucial for simulating extreme weather events like the Meiyu rainfall. This can lead to improved predictions and understanding of regional climatic phenomena, though it may also introduce biases such as overestimation of convective precipitation.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用汤普森微物理方案可以更准确地表示降水过程，这对于模拟梅雨降雨等极端天气事件至关重要。这可以改善对区域气候现象的预测和理解，尽管它也可能引入一些偏差，例如对对流降水的高估。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to improve the simulation of extreme Meiyu rainfall events in regions downstream of the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么改善对青藏高原下游地区极端梅雨降水事件的模拟很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to enhance the understanding and prediction of regional climate patterns, particularly by addressing the added value of convection-permitting modeling over the Tibetan Plateau, which can potentially improve the representation of rainfall distribution, intensity, and processes in downstream areas like the Yangtze Plain.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是增强对区域气候模式的理解和预测，特别是通过解决在青藏高原上使用对流允许模型的附加价值，这可能改善对下游地区如长江平原的降雨分布、强度和过程的表征。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What challenges are addressed by developing datasets with a spatial resolution of 9 km and a temporal resolution of 3 hours for the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发具有9公里空间分辨率和3小时时间分辨率的数据集可以解决哪些挑战，特别是针对青藏高原？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The challenges addressed include the complexity and heterogeneity of the terrain and surface in the Tibetan Plateau, which limits observational data availability and adds uncertainties in numerical weather and climate simulations. High-resolution datasets aim to mitigate these issues by providing more accurate atmospheric and land surface information.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 所涉及的挑战包括青藏高原地形和地表的复杂性和异质性，这限制了观测数据的可用性，并增加了数值天气和气候模拟中的不确定性。高分辨率数据集旨在通过提供更准确的大气和地表信息来减轻这些问题。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumentation and procedural steps are involved in setting up a high-resolution atmospheric-hydrological simulation using the WRF model for data collection over the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用WRF模型在青藏高原上进行高分辨率大气-水文模拟的数据收集涉及哪些仪器和程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The simulation setup involves using the WRF version 4.1.1 model with specific parameterization schemes including the Thompson microphysics scheme, RRTM longwave radiation scheme, Dudhia shortwave radiation scheme, MYJ boundary layer scheme, and Noah land surface model. The model uses initial and boundary conditions from global atmospheric reanalysis data, specifically the ECMWF interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim), and updates sea surface temperature during the simulation with data from NOAA's Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature Analysis.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 模拟设置涉及使用WRF版本4.1.1模型，采用特定的参数化方案，包括汤普森微物理方案、RRTM长波辐射方案、杜希亚短波辐射方案、MYJ边界层方案和诺亚陆面模型。模型使用来自全球大气重分析数据的初始和边界条件，具体为欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时重分析（ERA-Interim），并在模拟过程中使用来自美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）的最佳插值海表温度分析数据更新海表温度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are the challenges of complex terrain and surface heterogeneity over the Tibetan Plateau addressed in the procedural framework of climate modeling to minimize uncertainties?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何在气候建模的程序框架中解决青藏高原复杂地形和表面异质性带来的挑战，以最小化不确定性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural framework addresses these challenges by employing convection-permitting modeling (CPM) which adds value to regional climate simulation. The framework involves using high-resolution models and datasets, such as the CN05.1 gridded daily precipitation dataset, to improve the spatial representation of climate features and mitigate uncertainties due to complex terrain and surface heterogeneity.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序框架通过采用对流允许建模（CPM）来应对这些挑战，从而为区域气候模拟增添价值。该框架涉及使用高分辨率模型和数据集，例如CN05.1网格化日降水数据集，以改善气候特征的空间表示，并减轻由于复杂地形和表面异质性带来的不确定性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the simulation of high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological data over the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得能够对青藏高原进行高分辨率的气象和水文数据模拟？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of the WRF4.1.1 model with specific parameterization schemes such as the Thompson microphysics scheme, RRTM longwave radiation scheme, Dudhia shortwave radiation scheme, MYJ boundary layer scheme, and Noah land surface scheme enables the simulation of high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological data over the Tibetan Plateau.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用WRF4.1.1模型及特定的参数化方案，如汤普森微物理方案、RRTM长波辐射方案、Dudhia短波辐射方案、MYJ边界层方案和Noah陆面方案，可以对青藏高原进行高分辨率的气象和水文数据模拟。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do specific data collection methods address the challenges posed by the complex and heterogeneous terrain of the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 具体的数据收集方法如何应对青藏高原复杂多样的地形带来的挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The complexity and heterogeneity of the terrain limit observational data availability, which is mitigated by using global atmospheric reanalysis data like ECMWF interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) and real-time analysis systems with varying grid resolutions to provide comprehensive initial and boundary conditions for modeling efforts.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 地形的复杂性和异质性限制了观测数据的可用性，这通过使用全球大气再分析数据（如欧洲中期天气预报中心的临时再分析数据ERA-Interim）和具有不同网格分辨率的实时分析系统来缓解，以为建模工作提供全面的初始和边界条件。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the complexity and heterogeneity of the Tibetan Plateau's terrain pose challenges for data collection and simulation accuracy in atmospheric-hydrological models?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么青藏高原地形的复杂性和异质性可能会对大气-水文模型中的数据收集和模拟精度构成挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain over the Tibetan Plateau limit the availability of observational data and development numerical models, which leads to considerable uncertainties in simulations of weather and climate over the region.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau 的基础表面和地形的复杂性和异质性限制了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展，这导致该地区天气和气候模拟中存在相当大的不确定性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be a wet bias in the simulation of regional climate models over the Tibetan Plateau, and how could this impact the representation of extreme rainfall events?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么区域气候模型在对青藏高原的模拟中可能存在湿偏差，这将如何影响极端降雨事件的表现？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The wet bias in the simulation could be attributed to too much convective precipitation caused by the cumulus parameterizations. This may impact the representation of extreme rainfall events by affecting the simulation of the spatial distribution and processes of heavy rainfall.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 模拟中的湿偏差可能归因于对流降水过多，这可能是由于积云参数化造成的。这可能会影响极端降雨事件的表现，进而影响强降雨的空间分布和过程的模拟。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective do you perceive the use of convection-permitting modeling (CPM) over the Tibetan Plateau in improving regional climate simulations?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为在青藏高原上使用对流允许模型（CPM）在改善区域气候模拟方面的有效性如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The CPM over the Tibetan Plateau is perceived as effective in improving regional climate simulations, particularly in reproducing regional climate features like precipitation and temperature. It enhances the simulation of the spatial distribution and intensity of rainfall events, despite some biases due to convective precipitation parameterizations.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原上，CPM被认为在改善区域气候模拟方面是有效的，特别是在再现降水和温度等区域气候特征方面。尽管由于对流降水参数化存在一些偏差，但它增强了降雨事件的空间分布和强度的模拟。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the challenges associated with collecting observational data over the Tibetan Plateau, and how might these challenges impact the accuracy of atmospheric modeling?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏高原的观测数据时，面临哪些挑战，这些挑战可能如何影响大气建模的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges associated with collecting observational data over the Tibetan Plateau include its complex and heterogeneous terrain, which limits data availability and complicates numerical modeling. These challenges contribute to uncertainties in weather and climate simulations over the region, impacting the accuracy of atmospheric modeling.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 收集青藏高原观测数据的挑战包括其复杂而异质的地形，这限制了数据的可用性并使数值建模变得复杂。这些挑战导致该地区天气和气候模拟的不确定性，影响了大气建模的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data is collected or simulated over complex terrains like the Tibetan Plateau, considering the varied surface and limited observational data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在像青藏高原这样复杂的地形上收集或模拟数据，因为地表变化多样且观测数据有限。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The Advanced Research Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model version 4.1 is used, incorporating global atmospheric reanalysis data from ECMWF interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) for initial and boundary conditions and NOAA Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature Analysis for sea surface temperature updates. These methods help simulate weather and climate over the Tibetan Plateau despite its complexity and heterogeneity.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 高级研究天气预报与预报（WRF）模型版本4.1被使用，结合了来自欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时再分析（ERA-Interim）的全球大气再分析数据作为初始和边界条件，以及国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）最佳插值海表温度分析用于海表温度更新。这些方法有助于模拟青藏高原的天气和气候，尽管其复杂性和异质性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges involved in ensuring accuracy in datasets for regional climate simulations over the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对确保青藏高原区域气候模拟数据集准确性所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain over the Tibetan Plateau, the largest and highest plateau in the world, limit the availability of observational data and the development of numerical models. This leads to considerable uncertainties in simulations of weather and climate over the region.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau 是世界上最大和最高的高原，其底层表面和地形的复杂性和异质性限制了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展。这导致该地区天气和气候模拟中存在相当大的不确定性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how datasets can effectively support regional climate characteristic and climate change research over the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据集如何有效支持对青藏高原的区域气候特征和气候变化研究。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Datasets like the high-resolution atmospheric-hydrological simulation dataset for the Tibetan Plateau, with a spatial resolution of 9 km and a temporal resolution of 3 hours, provide detailed variables such as precipitation, temperature, humidity, and various fluxes. These datasets help researchers understand and analyze regional climate characteristics and climate changes in the Tibetan Plateau area.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 像西藏高原高分辨率大气-水文模拟数据集这样的数据集，具有9公里的空间分辨率和3小时的时间分辨率，提供了降水、温度、湿度和各种通量等详细变量。这些数据集帮助研究人员理解和分析西藏高原地区的区域气候特征和气候变化。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the various data collection methods utilized for obtaining high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological simulation data related to the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨用于获取与青藏 Plateau 相关的高分辨率大气和水文模拟数据的各种数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for high-resolution atmospheric and hydrological simulation data over the Tibetan Plateau involve utilizing the WRF4.1.1 model with specific parameterization schemes such as the Thompson microphysics scheme, RRTM longwave radiation scheme, Dudhia shortwave radiation scheme, MYJ boundary layer scheme, and the Noah land surface process scheme. The initial and boundary conditions are derived from global atmospheric reanalysis data, and sea surface temperatures are updated using NOAA Optimum Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature Analysis.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 高分辨率大气和水文模拟数据的收集方法涉及使用WRF4.1.1模型，采用特定的参数化方案，如汤普森微物理方案、RRTM长波辐射方案、杜希亚短波辐射方案、MYJ边界层方案和诺亚陆面过程方案。初始和边界条件来自全球大气再分析数据，海表温度则使用NOAA最佳插值海表温度分析进行更新。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in the collection and simulation of climate data over the Tibetan Plateau and suggest strategies to overcome them.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析在青藏高原气候数据收集和模拟中面临的挑战，并提出克服这些挑战的策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting and simulating climate data over the Tibetan Plateau include the complexity and heterogeneity of the underlying surface and terrain, which limit observational data availability and numerical model development. This leads to uncertainties in weather and climate simulations. To overcome these challenges, researchers can employ convection-permitting modeling (CPM) techniques and use gridded datasets such as CN05.1 and those developed by the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau Research Institute for more accurate simulations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在收集和模拟青藏高原气候数据时，面临的挑战包括底层表面和地形的复杂性和异质性，这限制了观测数据的可用性和数值模型的发展。这导致天气和气候模拟中的不确定性。为了克服这些挑战，研究人员可以采用允许对流的建模（CPM）技术，并使用如CN05.1和青藏高原研究院开发的栅格数据集，以实现更准确的模拟。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please suggest potential datasets that can be used to investigate precipitation anomalies and extreme weather events over the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请建议一些潜在的数据集，以便研究青藏高原的降水异常和极端天气事件。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for investigating precipitation anomalies and extreme weather events over the Tibetan Plateau include the CN05.1 gridded daily precipitation dataset, real-time analysis systems with 0.25° and 0.1° grids from the National Meteorological Information Center, and the forcing dataset with 0.1° grids developed by the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau Research Institute of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (ITPCAS). These datasets provide comprehensive coverage and are suitable for analyzing regional climate characteristics and events.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集用于研究青藏高原的降水异常和极端天气事件，包括CN05.1格点日降水数据集、国家气象信息中心提供的0.25°和0.1°网格的实时分析系统，以及中国科学院青藏高原研究所（ITPCAS）开发的0.1°网格强迫数据集。这些数据集提供了全面的覆盖，适合分析区域气候特征和事件。
